description: VGAMER🎮 is a decentralized multiplayer gaming platform, where anyone can play, stake & stream console games, collect & build exciting items including NFT's. ✅Contract verified by BSCSCAN✅Audited by CoinTool ✅Audited by CoinScope(PinkSale Official Partner) ✅KYC Doxxed team by CoinScope✅KYC Doxxed team by PinkSale || Team hosting video AMA. Contract with triple audit♻. Cross-chain bridge NFT marketplace with staking pool. Play to earn. Large gamers community. 🎮PS5 giveaway & 🖼️NFT giveaway contests.||
